level.text: The Director shall require the placement of WORK ZONE signs, which conform to the specifications established by the Chief Engineer of the District of Columbia, at the point of ingress of highway and roadway work zone locations.
Persons managing work zones are required to install WORK ZONE signs at all ingress points to a work zone.
Persons managing work zones are required to remove or cover WORK ZONE signs when workers are not actually performing work in their official capacity.
